original_text: He went up to the Lord's temple. All the people who lived in Jerusalem and in the rest of Judah went with him. They included the priests, the Levites, young people and old people. Everyone went to the temple. They all listened while the king read to them all the words in the book of God's covenant. That was the book that Hilkiah had found in the Lord's temple.
korean_text: 여호와의 전에 올라가매 유다 모든 사람과 예루살렘 주민들과 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 모든 백성이 노소를 막론하고 다 함께 한지라 왕이 여호와의 전 안에서 발견한 언약책의 모든 말씀을 읽어 무리의 귀에 들려 주고

sentences.original_text: He went up to the Lord's temple
All the people who lived in Jerusalem
and in the rest of Judah went with him
sentences.korean_translation: 유다의 나머지 지역에 사는 사람들도 그와 함께 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: They all listened while the king read to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 왕이 그들에게 읽어주는 동안 모두 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: all the words in the book of God's covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 언약 책에 있는 모든 말씀을

sentences.original_text: that Hilkiah had found in the Lord's temple
